item.description:
STEAMIN' COFFEE: Sugar Cube Cafe in Cromwell
We'll meet there at 8pm for coffee/tea and food. They have live music too. The band is "DayDrug", an Indie Power Pop duo.

SCREAMIN' BROCCOLI: Rookies in Cromwell (next door)
We'll all go there at 10 pm to socialize further and hear the band "Screaming Broccoli"

Your organizer is Linda Karen. Look for the Meetup sign on the table.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Bad Weather- Event cancelled!--Steamin' Coffee and Screamin' Broccoli
